title: Coniston muster
creator_credit: Roger Sandall and Australian Institute of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Studies
brief_description: Describes the daily activities of Aboriginal stockmen on Coniston Station in the Northern Territory. Examines their attitudes to their work and to the land.
